text: 2. (10 minutes - class discussion) On Instagram an influencer posts new pictures of finite automata every day. This week the influencer expressed scepticism towards the subset construction. ”Why must the new start state in the DFA that you build be c—closure(g)?" Clearly that does not matter. We could just as well let {g} be the new start state”. The many followers gave the influencer 2 million likes and there were 16,000 new followers. Were they right?
